local_intent: Perceive the T-block, align for a side push, then push it 0.1m along 225° and verify proximity to the goal.
assumptions: Goal pose is available from prior perception
Side-push at yaw 90° matches the scene geometry
coherence_with_global: Uses the same perceive→align→push→verify flow as the GLOBAL_BT; parameters match the annotated Push (distance=0.1, direction=225, timeout=400) and maintain 10 Hz-friendly short actions.
